metadata.synopsis: Gangsters insist a man (Jeong Jun-ho) marry a mobster's daughter (Kim Jeong-eun) after he spends a drunken night with her.

reviews: It's a comedy that tries too hard to be funny, therefore it isn't. It has a plot that tries too hard to be crazy and off the wall, so it isn't that either.
An engaging romantic farce with classic screwball overtones, offset by particularly vicious scenes of gangland violence.
The unusual cultural details add a little color to the usual romantic turbulence, but it's otherwise as rote as its American counterparts.
